mapper.select: SELECT student.majorId from t_major,student where t_major.majorId=student.majorId and student.username=#{username}

select t_releaseexam.releaseExamId,t_paper.questionNumber,t_paper.sumQuestionScore,t_releaseexam.beginTime,t_paper.answerTime,t_paper.paperId,t_paper.paperName,t_examstate.examStateName from t_examstate,t_releaseexam,t_paper where (t_releaseexam.examStateId=t_examstate.examStateId and t_paper.paperId=t_releaseexam.paperId and t_releaseexam.majorId=#{majorId}) and (t_releaseexam.examStateId=2 or t_releaseexam.examStateId=1) ORDER BY examStateName DESC
select t_releaseexam.beginTime,t_paper.answerTime,t_releaseexam.releaseExamId from t_paper,t_releaseexam where t_paper.paperId=t_releaseexam.paperId

SELECT SUM(questionScore) from t_question,t_realpaper where t_realpaper.questionId=t_question.questionId and questionType='单选' and t_realpaper.paperId=#{paperId}

SELECT t_releaseexam.releaseExamId, t_releaseexam.beginTime, t_paper.paperId, t_paper.paperName, count(DISTINCT t_stuanswer.stuId) as JoinNumber
FROM t_releaseexam, t_stuanswer, t_paper WHERE t_paper.paperId=t_releaseexam.paperId and t_releaseexam.releaseExamId=t_stuanswer.releaseExamId and t_releaseexam.authorId = 3 GROUP BY t_stuanswer.releaseExamId

SELECT COUNT(a.isCheckNumber) AS checkNumber FROM
( SELECT count(DISTINCT isCheck) AS isCheckNumber FROM t_stuanswer WHERE isCheck = '未批阅' AND releaseExamId = #{releaseExamId} GROUP BY stuId ) a

SELECT t_stuanswer.stuid, t_stuanswer.releaseExamId, t_stuanswer.paperId, student.stuname, t_paper.paperName FROM t_stuanswer, student, t_paper WHERE t_stuanswer.stuId = student.stuid AND t_stuanswer.releaseExamId = #{releaseExamId} and t_paper.paperId=t_stuanswer.paperId and isCheck='未批阅' GROUP BY t_stuanswer.stuId

SELECT t_stuanswer.releaseExamId, t_stuanswer.questionId, t_question.questionName, t_question.questionScore, t_stuanswer.stuId, t_stuanswer.stuAnswer FROM t_stuanswer, t_question WHERE t_stuanswer.questionId = t_question.questionId AND t_stuanswer.releaseExamId = #{releaseExamId} AND stuId = #{stuId} AND isWrong = 3

update t_exam SET shortAnswerScore=#{shortAnswerScore} ,sumScore=examScore+shortAnswerScore where stuId=#{stuId} and releaseExamId=#{releaseExamId}
